name: Snowboard Mania
description:
Welcome to the start of my winter project Snowboarder Mania! I'm not sure where ill end up or what will end up being the finalized project but I figured this would be a fun winter game to make! This is inspired off the classic game Ski Free!

Movement is AWSD 

Walk up to the snowboard to mount your self

Try to get the best time! clock will start once you pass the green starting line. clock will stop once you cross the red finish line.

if you get nocked off, you can walk back to the board and get back on

R Restarts the room.

W to accelerate once your on the board S to slow down or stop.
